Description:
Detects logons using NTLM to hosts that are potentially not part of the domain.

Author: James Pemberton
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potential Remote Desktop Connection to Non-Domain Host
Query: sourcetype='windows-ntlm' eql select * from _source_ where eventid = '8001' and targetname like 'termsrv%'
